bug.author: sven1977
bug.description:
We are getting this in our Travis builds sometimes (different jobs), when ci/travis/install-ray.sh is run. Seems to happen randomly, occasionally in different jobs: <denchmark-code>Installed /home/travis/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/aiohttp-4.0.0a1-py3.6-linux-x86_64.egg 2548Searching for py-spy>=0.2.0 2549Reading https://pypi.org/simple/py-spy/ 2550Downloading https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/4f/a2/ebd4e717eba57a8192834497411822c5ec8597287f50c4ec034d1cfe47b1/py_spy-0.3.2-py2.py3-none-manylinux1_x86_64.whl#sha256=888d0906be1f79c9669e7df608979f70aa75609631a0c2a0ffc7b3ab03a5efaa 2551Best match: py-spy 0.3.2 2552Processing py_spy-0.3.2-py2.py3-none-manylinux1_x86_64.whl 2553Installing py_spy-0.3.2-py2.py3-none-manylinux1_x86_64.whl to /home/travis/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages 2554Adding py-spy 0.3.2 to easy-install.pth file 2555Traceback (most recent call last): 2556 File "setup.py", line 222, in <module> 2557 license="Apache 2.0") 2558 File "/home/travis/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/setuptools/__init__.py", line 144, in setup 2559 return distutils.core.setup(**attrs) 2560 File "/home/travis/miniconda/lib/python3.6/distutils/core.py", line 148, in setup 2561 dist.run_commands() 2562 File "/home/travis/miniconda/lib/python3.6/distutils/dist.py", line 955, in run_commands 2563 self.run_command(cmd) 2564 File "/home/travis/miniconda/lib/python3.6/distutils/dist.py", line 974, in run_command 2565 cmd_obj.run() 2566 File "/home/travis/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/setuptools/command/install.py", line 67, in run 2567 self.do_egg_install() 2568 File "/home/travis/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/setuptools/command/install.py", line 117, in do_egg_install 2569 cmd.run(show_deprecation=False) 2570 File "/home/travis/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/setuptools/command/easy_install.py", line 425, in run 2571 self.easy_install(spec, not self.no_deps) 2572 File "/home/travis/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/setuptools/command/easy_install.py", line 668, in easy_install 2573 return self.install_item(None, spec, tmpdir, deps, True) 2574 File "/home/travis/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/setuptools/command/easy_install.py", line 715, in install_item 2575 self.process_distribution(spec, dist, deps) 2576 File "/home/travis/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/setuptools/command/easy_install.py", line 760, in process_distribution 2577 [requirement], self.local_index, self.easy_install 2578 File "/home/travis/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 783, in resolve 2579 replace_conflicting=replace_conflicting 2580 File "/home/travis/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 1066, in best_match 2581 return self.obtain(req, installer) 2582 File "/home/travis/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 1078, in obtain 2583 return installer(requirement) 2584 File "/home/travis/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/setuptools/command/easy_install.py", line 687, in easy_install 2585 return self.install_item(spec, dist.location, tmpdir, deps) 2586 File "/home/travis/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/setuptools/command/easy_install.py", line 715, in install_item 2587 self.process_distribution(spec, dist, deps) 2588 File "/home/travis/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/setuptools/command/easy_install.py", line 740, in process_distribution 2589 self.install_egg_scripts(dist) 2590 File "/home/travis/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/setuptools/command/easy_install.py", line 614, in install_egg_scripts 2591 dist.get_metadata('scripts/' + script_name) 2592 File "/home/travis/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 1425, in get_metadata 2593 return value.decode('utf-8') 2594UnicodeDecodeError: 'utf-8' codec can't decode byte 0x84 in position 24: invalid start byte in scripts/py-spy file at path: /home/travis/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/py_spy-0.3.2-py3.6-linux-x86_64.egg/EGG-INFO/scripts/py-spy (edited </denchmark-code>
e.g. this build: <denchmark-link:https://travis-ci.com/ray-project/ray/jobs/286434928>https://travis-ci.com/ray-project/ray/jobs/286434928</denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
I will fix this in travis soon. Just in case anyone end up here while debugging, please use <denchmark-code>pip install ... </denchmark-code>
instead of <denchmark-code>python setup.py ... </denchmark-code>
because pip handle binaries images correctly while the setup.py execution falsely parse the binary shared object as text data.
